content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0) with fuel {'coal': 40} and status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Inserter 1 at position (60.5, -61.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (60.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 47} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION.

### Inserter 2 at position (61.5, -61.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (61.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 19} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Inserter 3 at position (62.5, -60.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (62.5, -60.5) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Chest at position (62.5, -61.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (62.5, -61.5) with an empty inventory.

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an OffshorePump at position (107.5, -33.5) with a fluid box containing water.

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a Generator at position (117.5, -30.5) with status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED.

### Pipe Group 1
Consists of a PipeGroup with fluid system 142794, fluid water, and pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), and (109.5, -31.5).

### Pipe Group 2
Consists of a PipeGroup with fluid system 142796, and pipes at positions (111.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), (114.5, -33.5), (117.5, -33.5), and (116.5, -33.5).

### Electricity Group
Consists of an ElectricityGroup with id 576328 and a pole at position (119.5, -30.5).

### Belt
Consists of a Belt at position (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5) with direction Direction.UP.

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when connecting pipes: Ensure that the entities are close enough to each other and that the pipe can be placed without any obstacles.
* Errors when placing entities: Make sure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.
* Errors when using inserters: Ensure that the inserter has enough fuel and that the source and destination entities are correctly configured.
* Errors when using the offshore pump: Ensure that the offshore pump is correctly connected to the boiler and that the fluid system is properly configured.
* Errors when using the steam engine: Ensure that the steam engine is correctly connected to the boiler and that the fluid system is properly configured.

### NAMESPACE
* connect_entities function: This function has been invoked multiple times with different entities, but has failed due to the entities being too far apart.
* Important variables:
	+ boiler: Boiler entity at position (111.5, -32.0)
	+ offshore_pump: OffshorePump entity at position (107.5, -33.5)
	+ steam_engine: Generator entity at position (117.5, -30.5)
	+ pipe: Pipe entity
	+ inserter: BurnerInserter entity
	+ chest: Chest entity at position (62.5, -61.5)
